summary: Add gloves with new usable enchant in Honeyside home in riften. The Enchant is fortify enchanting and smithing.
descriptionHtml:
DESCRIPTION:
Add gloves with new usable enchant in Honeyside home in riften. The gloves are on the chest and the enchant can be get from the enchanting table when you have the gloves. The Gloves are called hands of the master. The Gloves Enchant is Fortify Enchanting and Fortify Smithing.
INSTALLATION:
For Nexus Mod Manager just click on \"Download with Manager\". And activate the mod.
If this is your first mod go to My document/MyGames/Skyrim then in skyrimprefs.ini
[Launcher]
bEnableFileSelection=1
Then copy all files from \"hands of the master.rar\" in the data folder and start the game with launcher select data files and select hands of the master. Then just start the game and have fun.

You can see my other mod 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21523
author: George Sergiev
